<h2>$ cat microbio</h2> <p><img src="../lost+found/ghlp.jpg" alt="ghlp" /></p> <p>University degrees:</p> <ul> <li>D.Sc. in Computer Science, <a href="http://cin.ufpe.br">UFPE</a>, March, 2015 (expected).</li> <li>M.Sc. in Computer Science, <a href="http://www.inf.ufpr.br/dinf/">UFPR</a>, March, 2010.</li> <li>B.Sc. in Computer Science, <a href="http://www.cesupa.br">CESUPA</a>, December, 2007.</li> </ul> <p>I am a member of:</p> <ul> <li>Software Productivity Group (<a href="http://twiki.cin.ufpe.br/twiki/bin/view/SPG/">SPG</a>)</li> <li>Association for Computing Machinery (ACM)</li> <li>ACM Special Interest Group on Software Engineering (SIGSOFT)</li> <li>ACM Special Interest Group on Programming Languages (SIGPLAN)</li> <li>Brazilian Computer Society (SBC)</li> </ul> <p>Social network:</p> <ul> <li><a href="http://www.twitter.com/gustavopinto">Twitter</a></li> <li><a href="https://www.facebook.com/ghpinto">Facebook</a></li> <li><a href="http://instagram.com/gustavohlp">Instagram</a></li> <li><a href="http://www.github.com/gustavopinto">Github</a></li> <li><a href="http://www.shelfari.com/gustavopinto/shelf">Shelfari</a></li> </ul>
